item.title: 3nodes-Hadoop-installation-setup
item.description: Setup 3 nodes Hadoop Hadoop Introduction Hadoop is an open-source Apache project that allows creation of parallel processing applications on large data sets, distributed across networked nodes. It’s composed of the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFSâ„¢) that handles scalability and redundancy of data across nodes, and Hadoop YARN: a framework for job scheduling that executes data processing tasks on all nodes. Before You Begin Follow the Getting Started guide to create three (3) nodes.
